means: 将（酒等）自瓶中倒入另一容器

sentence.Network_en: She always used to decant the milk into a jug.
sentence.Network_cn: 她过去总是把牛奶倒入一个壶中。

sentence.Network_en: May I decant it now to allow it to breathe?
sentence.Network_cn: 我可否慢慢倒,好让香味散发出来?

sentence.Network_en: You centrifuge the solution, decant the supernatant, and discard the pellet.
sentence.Network_cn: 你然后对溶液离心, 慢慢倒出上清,弃沉淀.对上清液你加更多的硫酸铵.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 醒酒(Decanting)是一们大学问,有些人并不以为然,但对于像我这样的初学者,这可是个不小的难题!有些红酒专家认为所有的红酒都应该 …
医学英语 ... Dead space 无效空间 Decant 倾注 Decay 腐败.
gre词汇精选（最新词汇） - 豆丁网 ... debonair 迷人的；友好的 decant 轻轻倒出 decentralize 分散，权力下放.
换瓶（decant） (Decanting) ， 一般来说，陈年的葡萄酒因为单宁形成粗重的分子，而形成沉淀物，所以需要换瓶（decant），以免喝到沉淀的杂质。虽然 …

decanone 癸酮decanted oil 倾析油decanter 倾注洗涤器

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from medieval Latin decanthare, from Latin de- 'away from' + canthus 'edge, rim' (used to denote the angular lip of a beaker), from Greek kanthos 'corner of the eye'

entry.tran: 把（液体）倒出（至其他容器中)
entry.def: If you decant a liquid into another container, you put it into another container.

example.ex: She always used to decant the milk into a jug...
example.tran: 她过去总是把牛奶倒入一个壶中。

example.ex: Vintage ports must be decanted to remove natural sediments.
example.tran: 上等的波尔图葡萄酒必须倒入其他容器中以滤除自然沉淀物。

auth_sentence.content: When reviewing wines, I always prefer to decant.
auth_sentence.res_content: When reviewing wines, I always prefer to decant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When reviewing wines, I always prefer to decant.

auth_sentence.content: Decant into small ramekins and put in the fridge to set.
auth_sentence.res_content: Decant into small ramekins and put in the fridge to set.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Decant into small ramekins and put in the fridge to set.

auth_sentence.content: I watched her decant the kabire into my plastic feeding bottle.
auth_sentence.res_content: I watched her decant the kabire into my plastic feeding bottle.
